name: The Journey Vol:2 Conflict and Resolution
name_original: The Journey Vol:2 Conflict and Resolution
description: Music to be used in your game how you see fit. Intro to boss, battle or cut scene. The tracks are not set up for continuous looping. Best for one shot or fade in and out as needed. I would to know if these tracks are used in a project. So please give me shout if so. No credit is needed but much appreciated.
